description.narrative: Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VCCI): VCCI joins the Action as a co-applicant with Oxfam. VCCI is the largest business membership organization in Vietnam. It has a very wide network of membership businesses in all sectors and nationwide. Importantly, VCCI is a very influential and advisory organization to the Government of Vietnam in terms of business. Participating in the Action as a co-applicant will allow VCCI to make the best use of its expertise, network, and influence on both businesses and the Government. VCCI will be mainly responsible for coordinating the implementation of work areas related to the EU market and EVFTA knowledge improvement for the SMEs, digital platform development, management and promotion, and organization of the matchmaking, networking, and tradeshows and trade fairs. It will also undertake the promotion of replicability at scale among the Vietnamese business community and enabling policy environment. Specifically, VCCI will take a leading role in developing tailordesigned EVFTA guidebook developments, and operation and management of the digital platform. Besides, VCCI will join with the lead applicant, other partners and stakeholders in a supporting role in implementing activities related to the development of EUmarket outlook and forecasts and information updates.
